A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just didn't care for Rian Johnson's take on \"The Last Jedi.\" My main problem\, is with how Johnson handled Luke Skywalker. I grew up as a fan of Luke; stood in line back in 77\" when I was about 10 years old. To see how Luke's character was handled in this film\, was hard for me to watch. I also hated the fact that Johnson\, pretty much\, attempted to ignore so many story points presented to us in the Force Awakens. I just really\, kind of hated this movie.
